column2: but if you don't want to wait go during their down time.  My daughter and I had a late lunch and sat at the bar for quick service.  Bartender had great knowledge of wine pairing!  Loved the bone marrow and the eggplant bruschetta.  Truly a food adventure!  We were initially disappointed that they were out of the mushroom shawarma but after our meal
column3: we didn't even care!  We will go back and order that next time!  Can't wait!
